variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-cloudpickle
dependencies.description: Extended pickling support for Python objects.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-locket
dependencies.description: File-based locks for Python for Linux and Windows.

dependencies.name: py-msgpack
dependencies.description: MessagePack (de)serializer.

dependencies.name: py-packaging
dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-sortedcontainers
dependencies.description:
Sorted Containers is an Apache2 licensed sorted collections library,
written in pure-Python, and fast as C-extensions.

dependencies.name: py-tblib
dependencies.description: Traceback fiddling library. Allows you to pickle tracebacks.

dependencies.name: py-toolz
dependencies.description: A set of utility functions for iterators, functions, and dictionaries

dependencies.name: py-tornado
dependencies.description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.

dependencies.name: py-urllib3
dependencies.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.

dependencies.name: py-versioneer
dependencies.description:
Versioneer is a tool to automatically update version strings by asking
your version-control system about the current tree.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-zict
dependencies.description: Mutable mapping tools

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-devito
dependent_to.description:
Devito is a Python package to implement optimized stencil computation.
(e.g., finite differences, image processing, machine learning) from
high-level symbolic problem definitions. Devito builds on SymPy and
employs automated code generation and just-in-time compilation to
execute optimized computational kernels on several computer platforms,
including CPUs, GPUs, and clusters thereof.

dependent_to.name: py-earth2mip
dependent_to.description:
Earth-2 Model Intercomparison Project (MIP). A python framework that
enables climate researchers and scientists to explore and experiment
with AI models for weather and climate.

dependent_to.name: py-smac
dependent_to.description:
SMAC is a tool for algorithm configuration to optimize the parameters of
arbitrary algorithms, including hyperparameter optimization of Machine
Learning algorithms.

dependent_to.name: py-datacube
dependent_to.description: An analysis environment for satellite and other earth observation data.

dependent_to.name: py-modin
dependent_to.description: Modin: Make your pandas code run faster by changing one line of code.

dependent_to.name: py-xgboost
dependent_to.description:
XGBoost is an optimized distributed gradient boosting library designed
to be highly efficient, flexible and portable.

dependent_to.name: py-dask
dependent_to.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.
